https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qSYahzzFP7od6mFegr64V0aGoYr.jpg After a tragedy reunites Nicole with her childhood friends, they each find themselves in danger, targets of a deranged stalker. Nicole knows this can't be a coincidence. The secrets of their past are coming back to haunt them. Always and Forever
